stack.name: pluginlib

description.brief: Tools for creating and using plugins with ROS

stack.description: The pluginlib package provides tools for writing and dynamically loading plugins using the ROS build infrastructure. To work, these tools require plugin providers to register their plugins in the manifest.xml of their package. Pluginlib includes parts of Poco from pocoproject.org
stack.author: Eitan Marder-Eppstein
Tully Foote
Dirk Thomas
stack.copyright: Willow Garage, Applied Informatics Software Engineering GmbH
